short_description: Concerns about fairness in land compensation.
description: Issues regarding delays or unfair compensation for private lands acquired for public projects.
description_ne: सार्वजनिक परियोजनाका लागि निजी जग्गा अधिग्रहणमा ढिलाइ वा अनुचित मुआवजाको समस्या।
follow_up_question_description: "What specific challenges have you faced with land compensation?"
follow_up_question_description_ne: "जग्गा मुआवजामा तपाईंले के के चुनौतीहरू सामना गर्नुभयो?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "What is the size of the land affected (in sq. meters or hectares)?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "प्रभावित जग्गाको आकार कति छ (वर्ग मिटर वा हेक्टरमा)?"

short_description: Issues shifting utilities like power lines or networks.
short_description_ne: बिजुली लाइन वा नेटवर्क जस्ता उपयोगिताहरू सार्ने समस्या।
description: Challenges in restoring access to electricity due to project disruption.
description_ne: परियोजना व्यवधानका कारण बिजुली पहुँच पुनर्स्थापना गर्ने चुनौती।
follow_up_question_description: "How long has the electricity access been disrupted?"
follow_up_question_description_ne: "बिजुली पहुँच कति लामो समयदेखि बाधित छ?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "How many households or businesses are impacted by the outage?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "कति घरधुरी वा व्यापारहरू यस बिजुली बाधाको प्रभावमा छन्?"

short_description: Issues shifting water pipes.
description: Disruptions caused by water pipe relocations, leading to water shortages.
description_ne: पानी पाइप स्थानान्तरणका कारण पानीको कमी भएको व्यवधान।
follow_up_question_description: "How long has the water access been disrupted?"
follow_up_question_description_ne: "पानी पहुँच कति लामो समयदेखि बाधित छ?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "How many people or households lack water access?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "कति मानिस वा घरधुरीहरूको पानी पहुँच छैन?"

short_description: Need for safe animal crossings across roads.
short_description_ne: सडकहरूमा वन्यजन्तुहरूका लागि सुरक्षित पारगमनको आवश्यकता।
description: Requests to construct underpasses or bridges for wildlife movement, preventing accidents and habitat fragmentation.
description_ne: वन्यजन्तुहरूको आवागमनका लागि अण्डरपास वा पुल निर्माणको अनुरोध, दुर्घटना र आवास विखण्डन रोक्न।
follow_up_question_description: "Which species are most affected by the absence of crossings?"
follow_up_question_description_ne: "क्रसिङको अभावमा कुन प्रजातिहरू सबैभन्दा बढी प्रभावित छन्?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "How many wildlife accidents have occurred?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "कति वन्यजन्तु दुर्घटनाहरू भएका छन्?"

short_description: Destruction of natural wildlife habitat.
description: Complete destruction of wildlife habitats by project activities, endangering species.
description_ne: परियोजना गतिविधिहरूद्वारा वन्यजन्तु आवासहरूको पूर्ण विनाश, प्रजातिहरूलाई जोखिममा पार्दै।
follow_up_question_description: "Which wildlife habitats have been affected?"
follow_up_question_description_ne: "कुन वन्यजन्तु आवासहरू प्रभावित भएका छन्?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "Which endangered species have been affected?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "कुन लोपोन्मुख प्रजातिहरू प्रभावित भएका छन्?"
column14: "What is the estimated size of the habitat destroyed (in sq. meters)?"
column15: "विनाश भएको आवासको अनुमानित आकार कति छ (वर्ग मिटरमा)?"

short_description: Complaints about air pollution due to construction.
description: Airborne dust and emissions from machinery and vehicles affecting nearby areas.
description_ne: मेसिनरी र सवारी साधनहरूबाट हावामा उड्ने धूलो र उत्सर्जनले नजिकैका क्षेत्रहरूलाई प्रभावित गर्दै।
follow_up_question_description: "How does it affect the health of your relatives?"
follow_up_question_description_ne: "यसले तपाईंका नातेदारहरूको स्वास्थ्यलाई कसरी असर गर्छ?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "How many people are affected, can you list them?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "कति मानिसहरू प्रभावित छन्, तपाईं तिनीहरूलाई सूचीबद्ध गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ?"
high_priority: "Can you assess the gravity of their illness on a scale from 1 to 5?"
column14: "तपाईं तिनीहरूको बिरामीको गम्भीरतालाई १ देखि ५ को स्केलमा मूल्याङ्कन गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ?"

short_description: Complaints about noise due to construction.
description: Noise from heavy machinery and vehicular traffic disrupting local communities.
description_ne: भारी मेसिनरी र सवारी साधनहरूबाट आउने ध्वनिले स्थानीय समुदायहरूलाई व्यवधान पुर्याउँदै।
follow_up_question_description: "What time periods are worst for noise pollution?"
follow_up_question_description_ne: "ध्वनि प्रदूषणका लागि कुन समयावधि सबैभन्दा खराब छ?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "How many hours per day are noise levels intolerable?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "दिनको कति घण्टा ध्वनि स्तर असहनीय छ?"

short_description: Requests for jobs for locals during projects.
short_description_ne: परियोजनाहरूका बेला स्थानीयहरूका लागि रोजगारीको अनुरोध।
description: Frustrations over limited or inequitable job opportunities for local populations despite project benefits.
description_ne: परियोजना लाभहरूको बावजुद सीमित वा अनुचित रोजगारी अवसरहरूका कारण स्थानीय जनसंख्याको निराशा।
follow_up_question_description: "Have you or others applied for jobs? What was the outcome?"
follow_up_question_description_ne: "तपाईं वा अरूले रोजगारीका लागि आवेदन गर्नुभयो? नतिजा के भयो?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "How many people have been affected by lack of employment opportunities?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "रोजगारी अवसरको कमीले कति मानिसहरूलाई प्रभावित गरेको छ?"

short_description: Impacts on cultural or religious sites.
description: Damage or disrespect to cultural monuments or religious shrines during construction.
description_ne: निर्माणका बेला सांस्कृतिक स्मारक वा धार्मिक मन्दिरहरूलाई क्षति वा अनादर।
follow_up_question_description: "Which cultural or religious sites have been affected?"
follow_up_question_description_ne: "कुन सांस्कृतिक वा धार्मिक स्थलहरू प्रभावित भएका छन्?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "How many cultural events or practices have been impacted?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "कति सांस्कृतिक कार्यक्रम वा प्रथाहरू प्रभावित भएका छन्?"

short_description: Safety concerns specific to women.
description: Fear of harassment or lack of safe infrastructure for women in construction zones.
description_ne: निर्माण क्षेत्रहरूमा महिलाहरूका लागि उत्पीडनको डर वा सुरक्षित आधारभूत संरचनाको कमी।
follow_up_question_description: "Have specific incidents or risks been identified, can you list them?"
follow_up_question_description_ne: "के विशिष्ट घटना वा जोखिमहरू पहिचान गरिएका छन्, तपाईं तिनीहरूलाई सूचीबद्ध गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "How many events have been reported to you?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "तपाईंलाई कति घटनाहरू रिपोर्ट गरिएका छन्?"

short_description: Forced relocation problems.
description: Inadequate resettlement provisions, cultural reasons for rejection, or poor housing and infrastructure.
description_ne: अपर्याप्त पुनर्स्थापना व्यवस्था, अस्वीकारका सांस्कृतिक कारणहरू, वा खराब आवास र आधारभूत संरचना।
follow_up_question_description: "What specific issues have you encountered with relocation?"
follow_up_question_description_ne: "स्थानान्तरणमा तपाईंले के के विशिष्ट समस्याहरू सामना गर्नुभयो?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "How many individuals or families have been displaced?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "कति व्यक्ति वा परिवारहरू विस्थापित भएका छन्?"

short_description: Poor water management causing non-farm damage.
short_description_ne: खराब जल व्यवस्थापनले कृषि बाहिरका क्षतिको कारण।
description: Construction blockages causing flooding, waterlogging, or sanitation hazards.

follow_up_question_description: "What areas are affected by flooding or waterlogging?"
follow_up_question_description_ne: "कुन क्षेत्रहरू बाढी वा जलजमावले प्रभावित छन्?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "What is the estimated damage area (in sq. meters or hectares)?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "अनुमानित क्षति क्षेत्र कति छ (वर्ग मिटर वा हेक्टरमा)?"

short_description: Pedestrian safety demands.
description: Lack of crosswalks or underpasses, leading to unsafe conditions in high-traffic zones.
description_ne: क्रसवाक वा अण्डरपासको कमी, उच्च यातायात क्षेत्रहरूमा असुरक्षित अवस्था उत्पन्न गर्दै।
follow_up_question_description: "Which areas lack safety provisions for pedestrians?"
follow_up_question_description_ne: "कुन क्षेत्रहरूमा पैदल यात्रीहरूका लागि सुरक्षा व्यवस्था छैन?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "How many accidents or near misses have occurred?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "कति दुर्घटना वा नजिकैको घटनाहरू भएका छन्?"

short_description: Chemical spills or waste contaminating farmland.
short_description_ne: रसायनिक फैलावट वा फार्मल्याण्डलाई प्रदूषित गर्ने फोहोर।
description: Contamination from construction materials or fuel degrading soil productivity.

follow_up_question_quantification: "What is the size of the affected farmland (in hectares)?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "प्रभावित कृषि जग्गाको आकार कति छ (हेक्टरमा)?"

short_description: Loss of soil fertility or damage.
description: Soil compaction, erosion, or sediment deposition on farmlands caused by project activities.
description_ne: परियोजना गतिविधिहरूका कारण फार्मल्याण्डहरूमा माटोको दबाव, क्षरण, वा तलछट जम्मा।

follow_up_question_description_ne: "माटोमा के के विशिष्ट क्षति भएको छ?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "How much farmland has been rendered unusable (in hectares)?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "कति कृषि जग्गा प्रयोग नहुने बनाइएको छ (हेक्टरमा)?"

short_description: Concerns about deforestation.
description: Felling of trees for construction affecting ecosystems and local livelihoods.
description_ne: निर्माणका लागि रूख काट्नाले पारिस्थितिक तन्त्र र स्थानीय जीविकालाई प्रभावित गर्दै।

follow_up_question_quantification: "How many trees have been felled in total?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "जम्मा कति रूखहरू काटिएका छन्?"

short_description: Damage to crops by construction or trespassing.
short_description_ne: निर्माण वा अनधिकृत प्रवेशद्वारा बालीहरूलाई क्षति।

description_ne: धूलो, मलबा, वा परियोजना सवारी साधनहरूको अतिक्रमणबाट कृषि उत्पादनको हानि।

follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "उत्पादनमा जम्मा कति हानि भएको छ (किलो वा टनमा)?"

short_description: Stolen crops or livestock.
description: Reports of theft of harvested or unharvested crops, or livestock.
description_ne: कटाइ भएका वा नकटाइएका बाली, वा पशुधनको चोरीको रिपोर्ट।

short_description: Stolen farming or personal tools.
description: Loss of implements allegedly taken by workers or others in project zones.
description_ne: परियोजना क्षेत्रहरूमा कामदार वा अरूले लिएको भनिएका सामानहरूको हानि।

follow_up_question_description_ne: "कुन विशिष्ट सामान वा उपकरणहरू चोरिएका छन्?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "What is the estimated value of the stolen tools (in currency)?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "चोरिएका सामानहरूको अनुमानित मूल्य कति छ (मुद्रामा)?"

short_description: Accidental or intentional fires.
description: Fires caused by mishandling of flammables or negligence, damaging property or resources.
description_ne: ज्वलनशील पदार्थहरूको गलत व्यवहार वा लापरवाहीका कारण आगो, सम्पत्ति वा स्रोतहरूलाई क्षति पुर्याउँदै।

follow_up_question_description_ne: "आगोको कारण के थियो, र कुन सम्पत्ति प्रभावित भएको थियो?"
follow_up_question_quantification: "What is the total area or value of damage caused by the fire?"
follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "आगोका कारण भएको क्षतिको जम्मा क्षेत्र वा मूल्य कति छ?"
high_priority: "आगोका कारण भएको क्षतिको जम्मा क्षेत्र वा मूल्य कति छ?"

generic_grievance_name: Poor housing quality of the resettlement site
short_description: Poor housing quality of the resettlement site
description: Lack of adequate resettlement, compensation, or alternative housing for those displaced by the project.
description_ne: परियोजनाद्वारा विस्थापित भएकाहरूका लागि अपर्याप्त पुनर्स्थापना, मुआवजा, वा वैकल्पिक आवासको कमी।

follow_up_question_description_ne: "तपाईंले आफ्नो आवास र यसको अवस्था वर्णन गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ?"

generic_grievance_name: Lack of infrastructure of the resettlement site

description: Lack of road, electricity, water, access to public transport at the resettlement site

follow_up_question_description: "Can you describe the issues you face because of the lack of infrastructure?"

follow_up_question_quantification_ne: "कुन कुन आधारभूत संरचनाहरू कमी छन्?"

generic_grievance_name: Poor location of the resettlement site
short_description: Poor location of the resettlement site
description: Distance to village from the resettlement site and lack of job opportunities or access to school

follow_up_question_quantification: "How long does it take to go to your farm site or village or school?"

short_description: Any aggression or gender related issue
short_description_ne: कुनै पनि आक्रामकता वा लिङ्ग सम्बन्धी समस्या।
description: True
